description:
For more than 35 years, the people of Maryland and Virginia have put their trust in the dedicated attorneys at the Cambridge law firm of Jenkins Block & Associates, P.C. The reason why clients know to turn to our firm for assistance as they pursue personal injury compensation, workers' compensation and Social Security Disability benefits is quite simple: We have a well-deserved reputation as dedicated client advocates.

Founded in 1977, our law firm began as a two-person operation with a single law office. Today, our firm has four office locations in Maryland and Virginia, and is home to five experienced attorneys and more than 30 staff members.

Our attorneys have dedicated their careers to helping clients get the compensation or benefits they need to ensure their future financial stability. We understand the effects an accident, injury or disability can have on a victim and his or her family, which is why we work diligently not only to understand the challenges our client faces but also to help him or her overcome those challenges.

If you would like to find out how the attorneys at the law firm of Jenkins Block & Associates, P.C., can help you, you can learn more during a free initial consultation.
